user.title: Set up Ensure Device Control
user.description:
This integration provides reliable device control services with automatic retry logic.

No configuration is required - just click Submit to continue.

abort.already_configured: Ensure Device Control is already configured

turn_on.name: Turn On (with retry)
turn_on.description: Turn on a device with automatic retry logic via script.ensure_device_changes

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The entity or entities to turn on

brightness_pct.name: Brightness (%)
brightness_pct.description: Brightness percentage (0-100). Takes precedence over brightness.

brightness.name: Brightness (0-255)
brightness.description: Brightness value (0-255). Used if brightness_pct is not provided.

color_rgb.name: RGB Color
color_rgb.description: RGB color as a list of three integers [R, G, B]

color_name.name: Color Name
color_name.description: Named color (e.g., red, blue, homeassistant). Automatically converted to RGB.

turn_off.name: Turn Off (with retry)
turn_off.description: Turn off a device with automatic retry logic via script.ensure_device_changes

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The entity or entities to turn off

toggle.name: Toggle (with retry)
toggle.description: Toggle a device's state with automatic retry logic via script.ensure_device_changes

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: The entity or entities to toggle
